sources.title: Night Ambush (1957)
sources.description: Led by British officers, partisans on Crete plan to kidnap the island's German commander and smuggle him to Cairo to embarrass the occupiers. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/ill-met-by-moonlight-1957/

metadata.Plot: Based on the true story of how, during World War II, a gang of desperadoes (British officers enlisted for "hostilities only" and local partisans) went to the occupied island of Crete and kidnapped a German General from under the nose of his army. That was the easy bit. They then had to get him back to Cairo, Egypt, dodging an intense air and land search.
metadata.Writer: W. Stanley Moss, Michael Powell, Emeric Pressburger
metadata.Actors: Dirk Bogarde, Marius Goring, David Oxley
